title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 18
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 18:

We have 30 titles here:

-  Aalbers (Ed.) - Subprime Cities; the Political Economy of Mortgage Markets (2012)

-  Altman & Hotchkiss - Corporate Financial Distress and Bankruptcy, 3e (2006)

-  Anagnost et al (Eds.) - Global Futures in East Asia; Youth, Nation, and the New Economy in Uncertain Times (2013)

-  Barth et al (Eds.) - The Savings and Loan Crisis; Lessons from a Regulatory Failure (2004)

-  Bitros & Karayiannis - Creative Crisis in Democracy and Economy (2013)

-  Boyle - 2014; How to Survive the Next World Crisis (2010)

-  Burton - Out of the Present Crisis; Rediscovering Improvement in the New Economy (2012)

-  Cheng - Taming the Money Sharks; 8 Super-Easy Stock Investment Maxims (2013)

-  Ciro - The Global Financial Crisis; Triggers, Responses and Aftermath (2012)

-  Connaughton - The Payoff; Why Wall Street Always Wins (2012)

-  Crowder - Post Modern Investment; Facts and Fallacies of Growing Wealth in a Multi-Asset World (2013)

-  Dale (Ed.) - First the Transition, Then the Crash; Eastern Europe in the 2000s (2011)

-  Dreyfuss - Hedge Hogs; the Cowboy Traders Behind Wall Street's Largest Hedge Fund Disaster (2013)

-  Duff - The Buy Side; a Wall Street Trader's Tale of Spectacular Excess (2013)

-  Edelbacher et al (Eds.) - Financial Crimes; a Threat to Global Security (2012)

-  Fisher - Crashes, Crises, and Calamities; How We Can Use Science to Read the Early-Warning Signs (2011)

-  Galbraith - A Short History of Financial Euphoria (1990)

-  Global Financial Stability Report; Sovereigns, Funding, and Systemic Liquidity (IMF, 2010)

-  Irvine - Zombies, Bananas and Why There Are No Economists in Heaven (2012)

-  Johnson - Life or Debt 2010; a New Path to Financial Freedom (2010)

-  Karasavvoglou & Polychronidou (Eds.) - Economic Crisis in Europe and the Balkans; Problems and Prospects (2014)

-  Kolb - Lessons from the Financial Crisis; Causes, Consequences, and Our Economic Future (2010)

-  MacNeil & O'Brien (Eds.) - The Future of Financial Regulation (2010)

-  Oyama - Post-Crisis Risk Management; Bracing for the Next Perfect Storm (2010)

-  Paganetto (Ed.) - Public Debt, Global Governance and Economic Dynamism (2013)

- Palley - From Financial Crisis to Stagnation; the Destruction of Shared Prosperity and the Role of Economics (2012)

-  Rhodes & Stelter - Accelerating Out of the Great Recession; How to Win in a Slow-Growth Economy (2010)

-  Tilman - Financial Darwinism; Create Value or Self-Destruct in a World of Risk (2009)

-  Wolfson - Financial Crises; Understanding the Postwar U.S. Experience (1986)

-  Wright - One Nation Under Debt; Hamilton, Jefferson, and the History of What We Owe (2008)
